article.title: Living in Alan Turing's future
article.description: Our culture's thoughts, admirations, and lessons due to Alan Turing.

article.title: The Ultimate Productivity Hack is Saying No
article.summary: Saying no can sometimes be more responsible to efficiency than saying yes can.
article.description: Learning to say no effectively and "upgrading your no" can increase your productivity.

article.title: Absolute Success is Luck. Relative Success is Hard Work.
article.description: The more wild the the outcome of success, the more luck plays a role.
